ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Distance Issues
- When placing entities, ensure you are within the maximum placement distance (10 units)
- Move closer to target location before attempting to place entities
- Consider breaking down long-distance operations into smaller steps with intermediate movements

### Mining System Setup Issues
- Verify drill orientation and drop position match chest placement
- Ensure proper alignment between drill output and collection chest
- Test different drill orientations to find optimal setup
- Place collection chests only after confirming drill drop position

### Fuel Management Issues
- Cannot insert fuel into entities without having fuel in inventory
- Verify fuel availability before attempting to insert
- Monitor fuel levels in burner devices
- Ensure proper positioning next to entity when inserting fuel

### Entity State Verification Issues
- Check entity existence before attempting operations
- Verify entity state and warnings before operations
- Handle cases where entities may have been removed
- Monitor entity status changes after operations

### Resource Location Issues
- Verify exact resource patch locations using appropriate methods
- Double-check coordinates before setting up mining infrastructure
- Ensure mining setup is positioned directly on resource patches

### Power System Issues
- Steam engine not receiving electricity due to no fuel in boiler
- Monitor fluid connections between power system components
- Address "no input liquid" warnings in steam engine
- Ensure proper fluid flow through pipe networks
